Description: Blue glazed steatite scarab, elytra marked, feathered legs, pierced longitudinally, base decorated with spiral border and vertical inscription.
Curator's comments: Martin Egyptian Admin and Private-name Seals (1971) cat no.807 [pl.1.13].
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Purchased from: Giza Museum (and other sources)
